A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Bunch of politically correct nonsense.

The message of the movie is basically that men suck (they are dumb and impulsive) and we should just put women in charge and do whatever they say. I felt like I was watching a Lifetime movie.

Poor Mark Hamill.   They turned Luke Skywalker into a grumpy angry psycho and then threw him to the garbage. 

Very disrespectful to the fans of the franchise
